baseScenarioName.title: baseScenarioName
baseScenarioName.description: This will be a user input. Agent will be asking user to select a base scenario from a list of scenarios. When user selects a base scenario by entering the number. That specific name__c of PI_Scenario__c should be used as this input value.

newScenarioName.title: newScenarioName
newScenarioName.description: The name of new scenario. This will be provided by user as a result of a previous Action. Use that value.
